channel.title: ExousiaOS - OSRS - VPS - 24/7 - Boss Pets - Duo Slayer
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2lrz8w.png[/img]
Links:
Visit Our Forums: [url=http://exousiaos.com]ExousiaOS[/url]
Direct Download Link: [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/o7tv5tqyv7wcjmb/ExousiaOSV2.jar?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/o7tv5tqyv7wcjmb/ExousiaOSV2.jar?dl=0[/URL]
ExousiaOS is a new server full with content and imaginative coders. We always try to welcome players with open arms and we are a community driven server. We are going to have poll updates on the forums to determine the results of updates, so there is never an update the players do not want.
Here are just some of our features here at ExousiaOS:
OSRS items EXP Counter HD Minimap Boss pets Active players Dedicated coders/Owners Iron Man Mode Boss And Slayer Kill logs Duo Slayer Great slayer reward system Achievement System Quick Prayers Bank tabs 15 + bosses with all the OSRS bosses. 7 Mini-Games Prestiging Full Clan Chat With Ranks and colored chat Perfect OS Combat system
We have a lot more to offer in game and if you join you will not want to leave.
Here is some media to show what we have to offer:

ExousiaOS is a new server full with content and imaginative coders.
We always try to welcome players with open arms and we are a community driven server.
We are going to have poll updates on the forums to determine the results of updates, so there is never an update the players do not want.
